profile.name: Narayanan
profile.title: Software Developer & AI Engineer
profile.summary: Results-oriented Software Developer with experience in Python-based backend development and AI-enabled applications. Proficient in Python, Django, FastAPI, and RESTful APIs, with hands-on exposure to automation, LLM integration, and Linux environments. Demonstrated ability to build scalable backend services and practical software solutions.

description: Developed a Voice Outreach Lead Generation application using N8N automation.
Built automated lead generation workflows using N8N and LLM integrations.
Created an AI-based website generation tool using llms.txt concepts.
Implemented AI-driven automation pipelines for business and sales processes.
Integrated backend services with APIs, automation platforms, and AI models.
Developed backend services using Python and FastAPI.
Built an Email Automation system using Large Language Models.
Designed and deployed a Sentiment Analysis API.
Implemented LLM-based applications including Whisper-large-v3 and Sales Copilot use cases.
Created and managed REST APIs for AI-driven applications.
Worked with Linux environments and API testing tools like Postman.
